name: Connect - Deutsche Post DHL
description: Connect is THE mobile App for relevant news, information and interactions all around Deutsche Post DHL Group. Customers and employees can be up-to-date on whats going on in their region and in our company worldwide. Users can customize the App towards their needs via several user groups.  GAMECHANGER FOR DEUTSCHE POST DHL GROUP For the first time in Deutsche Post DHL Groups history, ONE App is connecting all customers and employees with each other  a real gamechanger for the communication and collaboration within the Group, but also a Gamechanger for each one of us on how we get and use information and services from anywhere at any time.  CHAT AND INTERACTIONS The App is interactive: Customers and employees can use the chat functionality or social walls to collaborate with each other and learn more about the company. Users can decide on their notifications about activities in the App  LOGIN AND LETS GO To use the internal content and functionalities of Connect, you need to have special credentials for the login. Each employee gets these until the end of 2021.  Join us on Connects journey to make the world of Deutsche Post DHL Group more colorful and interactive!
